metadata.name: Caves n' Creatures!
metadata.description:
[h3]Description[/h3] This mod adds a special beggar into the game - The Dungeon Master! Meet him in the arcade to play an Isaac-adapted version of a very popular board game - "Caves n' Creatures"! Featuring: [list] [*]6 new enemies to encounter during your quest alongside familiar ones. [*]A new boss to fight against, exclusive to the minigame! [*]A unique prompt system as your method of immersing yourself in the world. [*]Change your fate with one of the four original cast of Isaac characters, the consumables you collect, and of course, the roll of the die! [*]Up to three other players in your run able to play with you in the minigame! [/list]
[h3]Important Notes[/h3] [list] [*]This mod was stitched together last minute and may be prone to bugs. [*]It is not recommended you exit and continue the run during the minigame. It may break, it may not. [*]Improvements to the flow of the minigame and overall quality will come around soon! [/list]
[h3]Credits[/h3] Sanio - prompt system code Mr. SeemsGood - enemies and boss code AnglerFishart - sprites and art
--- [i]This mod was made as an entry to Year of the Gaper 2023 Modding Jam.[/i]
